review: This system has great potential.  The catalog is limited, and I expected more free programing with Prime membership.  The equipment works well and is inexpensive, but the catalog is poorly organized.  Simple lists of programs would be more helpful to me than the random aggregations of illustrated ad copy now used to select programs.
